title.zh: 余干：血友病女性家属公益检测活动
title.en: Yugan: Hemophilia Female Family Members Charity Testing Activity

subtitle.en: In Partnership with Yugan County Renhe Hospital

description.zh: 南昌市血之友公益协会携手余干县仁和医院，开展血友病女性家属公益检测活动。协会延续「携带者检测援助」项目，帮助10位女性得到了凝血检测。这次活动将专业的检测服务延伸到县级医院，进一步扩大了项目的覆盖范围，让更多基层地区的女性能够享受到便民的检测服务。
description.en: Nanchang Hemophilia Association partnered with Yugan County Renhe Hospital to conduct charity testing activities for female family members of hemophilia patients. The association continued the 'Carrier Testing Assistance' project, helping 10 women receive coagulation testing. This activity extended professional testing services to county-level hospitals, further expanding the project's coverage and allowing more women in grassroots areas to enjoy convenient testing services.

title.zh: 微信公众号：余干检测活动报道
